<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">11.3.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">co-operate</FONT> with the Purchaser and the Group Companies and take such
actions as the Purchaser may reasonably request with respect to the making and progression of any such claim, provided that the Seller&#146;s Group shall not be required to take any action which would reasonably be expected to have a material
adverse effect on the Seller&#146;s Group, its relationship with its insurers or its insurance coverage; and </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">11.3.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">pay any monies received from insurers under the relevant insurance policy in respect of such loss (after taking
into account any deductible under the insurance policy and less: (i)&nbsp;any Tax suffered on the proceeds; and (ii)&nbsp;all reasonable costs incurred by the Seller&#146;s Group in connection with the claim) to the relevant Group Company as soon as
practicable after receipt. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Clear Channel Espa&ntilde;a S.L.U.</U> </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">11.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller acknowledges and agrees that the only obligations and liabilities that the Group Companies shall
have following Completion with respect to Clear Channel Espa&ntilde;a, S.L.U. shall be: (i)&nbsp;the obligations and liabilities under each of the Spain Transitional Services Agreement, the Spain IP Licence, the Design and Tooling Licence and the
Trade Mark Licence; and (ii)&nbsp;the relevant obligations and liabilities expressly set out in this Agreement. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>12</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B>WARRANTIES, UNDERTAKINGS AND SPECIFIC INDEMNITIES </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Seller Warranties</U> </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

misleading as of the date of this Agreement. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

misleading as of the Completion Date, on the basis that any reference to the &#147;date of this Agreement&#148; in a Seller Warranty (as applicable) shall, for the purposes this Clause 12.2, be deemed to be a reference to the &#147;Completion
Date&#148;. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller Warranties (other than the Fundamental Seller Warranties): </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">as given pursuant to Clause 12.1, are given subject to any matters Disclosed in the Seller Disclosure Letter;
and </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

the Seller Completion Disclosure Letter, provided that the Seller Completion Disclosure Letter shall only disclose specific events, facts or circumstances which either: (i)&nbsp;have arisen following the date of this Agreement (including, for the
avoidance of doubt, pursuant to any change in legislation in force at the date of this Agreement); or (ii)&nbsp;in respect of Seller Warranties which are qualified by the awareness of the Seller, have arisen before the date of this Agreement, but
which the Seller only became aware of after the date of this Agreement. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Without prejudice to any of the Seller Warranties, the Seller does not give nor make any warranty or
representation as to the accuracy of the forecasts, estimates, projections, statements of intent or statements of opinion provided to the Purchaser on or prior to the date of this Agreement, including in the Information Memorandum or any other
documents provided in the Data Room. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">39 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Save in respect of paragraphs 2.2 to 2.5 inclusive and paragraph 3.3 of Schedule 4, the Seller Warranties shall
not apply in respect of CCTL and references to the &#147;Group&#148; and &#147;Group Company&#148; shall be construed accordingly. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.6</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Where a Seller Warranty is qualified by the knowledge, information, belief or awareness of the Seller, such
qualification shall be deemed to refer to the actual knowledge as of the relevant date each Seller Warranty is given of each of Justin Cochrane, Adam Tow, Sarah Tolia, Will Ramage, Richard Bon, Andr&eacute; Azadehdel, Raju Shah and Kate Douglas (or,
for the purposes of Clause 12.2, in the event that any such person ceases to be employed by the Group prior to Completion, any individual subsequently appointed or engaged by the Group prior to Completion to perform the same or substantially the
same role with the same or substantially the same title), having made reasonable enquiries of the Senior Group Employees, Daryl Hall and Jo Sudaria (save in respect of Sarah Tolia, who shall not be required to make any enquiries of the Senior Group
Employees, Daryl Hall or Jo Sudaria). </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.7</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller waives any claim (other than a claim for fraud, fraudulent misrepresentation or (in the case of any
employee, director or officer) wilful misconduct which gives rise to a right to their employer to terminate their employment or engagement without notice) that it may have against a Group Company or any of its employees, directors or officers
relating to any misrepresentation, inaccuracy or omission in or from any information or advice supplied or given by such person for the purpose of assisting the Seller to give any of the Seller Warranties or in preparing the Seller Disclosure Letter
or the Seller Completion Disclosure Letter. The Seller agrees that each Group Company and each such employee, director or officer may enforce the benefit of this Clause 12.7 in his, her or its own name whether or not the Purchaser is a party to the
proceedings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Purchaser warranties</U> </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.8</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser warrants to the Seller that, as of the date of this Agreement (and as of the Completion Date, on
the basis that any reference to the &#147;date of this Agreement&#148; in this Clause 12.8 shall be deemed to be a reference to the &#147;Completion Date&#148; for such purpose): </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.8.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">the Purchaser is a company duly incorporated under the laws of England and Wales; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

Agreement and each other Transaction Document to which the Purchaser is a party; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

constitute valid, binding and enforceable obligations of the Purchaser in accordance with their respective terms; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

and each other Transaction Document to which the Purchaser is a party will not: </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

Purchaser; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

Purchaser is a party; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

any order, injunction, judgement or decree of any court, that applies to the Purchaser; or </P></TD></TR></TABLE>

Purchaser shall procure that each Group Company shall, from and after Completion and to the fullest extent permitted in accordance with applicable Law, waive, release and discharge each Released Person from any and all claims, demands, proceedings,
causes of action, orders, obligations and liabilities arising out of any <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Pre-Completion</FONT> Event which each Group Company has or may at any time have had against any Released Person. The Purchaser shall procure
that each Group Company shall not, directly or indirectly, assert any claim or demand, or commence, institute or cause to be commenced, any proceedings of any kind relating to any <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Pre-Completion</FONT> Event against
any Released Person. The provisions of this Clause 12.9 shall not apply to any claim or liability for fraud, fraudulent misrepresentation or (in the case of any employee, director or officer) wilful misconduct which gives rise to a right to their
employer to terminate their employment or engagement without notice. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

Seller shall and shall procure that each member of the Seller&#146;s Group shall, from and after Completion and to the fullest extent permitted in accordance with applicable Law, waive, release and discharge each Group Released Person from any and

against any Group Released Person. The Seller shall not and shall procure that each member of the Seller&#146;s Group shall not, directly or indirectly, assert any claim or demand, or commence,
</P></TD></TR></TABLE>

this Clause 12.10 shall not apply to any claim or liability for fraud, fraudulent misrepresentation or (in the case of any employee, director or officer) wilful misconduct which gives rise to a right to their employer to terminate their employment

released, effective as of or as soon as reasonably practicable following Completion and at no cost to the Seller&#146;s Group, in respect of all obligations of the Seller&#146;s Group under any direct or indirect guarantees (including performance
guarantees), indemnities, letters of credit, cash collateral, letters of support and letters of comfort given in favour of or for the benefit of the Group, in each case as described in Part A of Schedule 7 (as may be updated in accordance with this
Clause 12.11) (the &#147;<U>Seller&#146;s Group</U> <U>Guarantees</U>&#148;). The Seller shall take all actions reasonably requested by the Purchaser in connection with any such removal or release, at the Purchaser&#146;s cost. The Seller, acting
reasonably (and subject always to paragraph 12 of Schedule 1), shall be permitted to update Part A of Schedule&nbsp;7, by written notice to the Purchaser from time to time and no later than six Business Days prior to the Completion Date, to reflect
any updates that have occurred in the ordinary course of business following the date of this Agreement. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

otherwise (the &#147;<U>Group Guarantees</U>&#148;). The Seller shall update Part B of Schedule&nbsp;7, by written notice to the Purchaser from time to time and no later than six Business Days prior to the Completion Date, to reflect any updates
that have occurred in the ordinary course of business following the date of this Agreement provided that the Seller shall procure that no Group Guarantee is entered into which requires any Group Company to provide any cash collateral or similar

Guarantees. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

Indemnifiable Losses which a member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group may suffer or incur following the Completion Date under or pursuant to any Group Guarantee (and under or pursuant to any other obligation that should have been, but was not, disclosed
in Part B of Schedule 7 as a Group Guarantee in accordance with Clause 12.12). </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.15</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Parties acknowledge and agree that, due to the nature of the obligation, the Seller&#146;s Group shall not
be required to cause Clear Channel International Limited to be removed or released from the obligations listed in Part C of Schedule 7 (the &#147;<U>Amscreen Framework Obligations</U>&#148;). Nevertheless, the Seller agrees to indemnify and keep
indemnified each member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group against all Indemnifiable Losses which a member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group may suffer in connection with the Amscreen Framework Obligations or otherwise with respect to any obligations of a
current or former member of the Seller&#146;s Group (other than the Group Companies) under or in connection with the Amscreen Agreements following the Completion Date. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">42 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Wrong pockets</U> </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.16</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller undertakes to the Purchaser that if, at any time within 15 months following the Completion Date, it
becomes aware of any asset that: (i)&nbsp;is a Business Asset; (ii)&nbsp;is owned by, or in the possession or under the control of, the Seller or any member of the Seller&#146;s Group; and (iii)&nbsp;should have been assigned or transferred to a
Group Company or the Purchaser at or prior to Completion but was not so transferred by a member of the Seller&#146;s Group or assigned (a &#147;<U>Purchaser Wrong Pocket Asset</U>&#148;), then the Seller shall hold, or shall procure that the
relevant member of the Seller&#146;s Group holds, such asset on trust absolutely for the relevant member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group and shall assign, transfer or deliver, or procure the assignment, transfer or delivery of, as the case may be,
such Purchaser Wrong Pocket Asset for nil consideration as soon as practicable after the date on which the Seller becomes aware of ownership, possession or control of such Purchaser Wrong Pocket Asset by such member of the Seller&#146;s Group, to
the relevant member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group or any Related Person of the Purchaser nominated by the Purchaser. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.17</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser undertakes to the Seller that if, at any time within 15 months following the Completion Date, it
becomes aware of any asset that: (i)&nbsp;is not a Business Asset; (ii)&nbsp;is owned by, or in the possession or under the control of, the Purchaser or any member of the Group; and (iii)&nbsp;should not have been assigned or transferred by a member
of the Seller&#146;s Group to a Group Company or the Purchaser at or prior to Completion but was so transferred or assigned (a &#147;<U>Seller Wrong Pocket Asset</U>&#148;), then the Purchaser shall hold, or shall procure that the relevant member of
the Purchaser&#146;s Group holds, such asset on trust absolutely for the relevant member of the Seller&#146;s Group and shall assign, transfer or deliver, or procure the assignment, transfer or delivery of, as the case may be, such Seller Wrong
Pocket Asset for nil consideration, as soon as practicable after the date on which the Purchaser becomes aware of the ownership, possession or control of such Seller Wrong Pocket Asset by such member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group, to the relevant
member of the Seller&#146;s Group or any Related Person of the Seller nominated by the Seller. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.18</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Parties shall do all such reasonable further acts and things, and shall execute such documents, as may be
reasonably necessary to effect the assignment, transfer and/or delivery of any Purchaser Wrong Pocket Asset or Seller Wrong Pocket Asset pursuant to 12.16 or 12.17 (as applicable). </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">De-branding</FONT> and Platform Trade Marks Licence</U> </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.19</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser shall, and shall procure that each Group Company shall (save to the extent otherwise provided
under any other Transaction Document), within: </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.19.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">two months<SUP STYLE="font-size:75%; vertical-align:top"> </SUP>after the Completion Date: (i)&nbsp;update each
Group Company&#146;s corporate and business records so that they no longer make use of or display any references to the Clear Channel Brand; (ii)&nbsp;file all such documents, as appropriate and necessary, before all Governmental Entities to change
the name of any Group Company that consists of or includes the Clear Channel Brand, to a name which does not include the Clear Channel Brand; and (iii)&nbsp;provide the Seller with appropriate evidence of such
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">de-branding</FONT> as set out in this Clause 12.19.1; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.19.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">12 months after the Completion Date, cease to use or display (including the removal, disposal or obliteration
of) the Clear Channel Brand on all of the Group Companies&#146; <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">out-of-home</FONT></FONT> assets and inventory (including all billboards, posters, signs, street furniture and other <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">out-of-home</FONT></FONT> advertising media); </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">43 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.19.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">subject to Clauses 12.19.1 and 12.19.2, four months after the Completion Date (or, in the case of any domain
names used for internal purposes only or internal use of email addresses, 12 months after the Completion Date), cease to use or display any trade or service name or mark, business name, logo or domain name which includes the Clear Channel Brand, and
remove, dispose of or obliterate the Clear Channel Brand from all other assets, goods, items or materials (including all inventory, documents, uniforms, forms, stationery, marketing materials, websites, email addresses, social media handles, domain
names, directories, offices, facilities, fixtures, signage, machinery, vehicles, clothing, training materials, laptop bags and umbrellas) that are within the Group Companies&#146; possession or control. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.20</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">For the duration of the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">de-branding</FONT> periods set out within Clauses
12.19.1, 12.19.2 and 12.19.3: (i) the Purchaser shall not, and shall procure that each Group Company shall not, conduct its business in a manner that tarnishes, harms, disparages, or otherwise affects the reputation of, or could reasonably be
expected to do so, the Seller or any member of the Seller&#146;s Group, or the Clear Channel Brand; and (ii)&nbsp;the Purchaser and each Group Company shall have the limited right to use or display the Clear Channel Brand solely for transitional
purposes, provided that the Clear Channel Brand is only used or displayed in the same way, and to the same or lesser extent, as was used or displayed in connection with the Group Companies, immediately prior to the date of this Agreement, and
provided further that this transitional right is without prejudice to the Purchaser&#146;s and each Group Company&#146;s obligation to cease using or displaying the Clear Channel Brand within the applicable
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">de-branding</FONT> periods set out within Clauses 12.19.1, 12.19.2 and 12.19.3. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.21</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser and each Group Company shall have no right to grant any licence under, nor to assign, the limited
rights granted under Clause 12.20. Any goodwill arising from the use of the Clear Channel Brand pursuant to Clause 12.20 shall accrue, and is hereby assigned, to the Seller or any relevant member of the Seller&#146;s Group, as the Seller may direct.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.22</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser agrees (and shall procure that each Group Company and each other member of the Purchaser&#146;s
Group agrees and shall act on the following basis): </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.22.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">save as permitted by Clause 12.20, that the Purchaser, the Group Companies and each other member of the
Purchaser&#146;s Group have no rights to use, or any other rights in or to, the Clear Channel Brand in any jurisdiction and shall not apply to register or otherwise attempt to register the Clear Channel Brand as a trade mark, service mark, domain
name, URL, social media account or handle or similar, or contest the ownership or validity of any rights of the Seller&#146;s Group in or to the Clear Channel Brand, in any jurisdiction; and </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.22.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">not to, expressly or by implication, conduct business, hold themselves out as being part of, connected or
associated with, or represent themselves as any member of the Seller&#146;s Group or any person connected with the Seller&#146;s Group (save to the extent it relates to solely to events arising prior to the Completion Date). </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.23</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser shall be responsible for and shall bear all costs of
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">de-branding</FONT> in accordance with Clauses 12.19 to 12.22 (inclusive). </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.24</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">With effect from the Completion Date, the Purchaser hereby grants, and shall procure that the relevant members
of the Purchaser&#146;s Group shall grant, to each member of the Seller&#146;s Group, a perpetual, irrevocable, <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-exclusive,</FONT> royalty-free, fully <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">paid-up</FONT> worldwide
licence to use the Platform Trade Marks in any medium (in any form) in a manner consistent with past practice in the 12 months prior to the Completion Date. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">44 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Seller <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-solicitation</FONT></U> </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.25</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller undertakes to the Purchaser (for its benefit and the benefit of each other member of the
Purchaser&#146;s Group) that, from the Completion Date until the end of the Restricted Period, neither it nor any other member of the Seller&#146;s Group shall, directly or indirectly, solicit for employment or seek to hire or employ: (i)&nbsp;any
Senior Group Employee; (ii)&nbsp;any person employed or engaged by the Group with a basic annual salary of &pound;150,000 or more (or the equivalent currency in the relevant jurisdiction); (iii) any then current director or officer of any Group
Company; or (iv)&nbsp;any former director or officer of any Group Company (to the extent that such persons have been employed or engaged by the Group in the 12 months prior to the Completion Date), in each case, whether or not such person would
commit a breach of any employment or service contract with the Group in leaving such employment or service or otherwise doing so. The Seller agrees that each such other member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group may enforce the benefit of the provisions
of this Clause 12.25 in its name whether or not the Purchaser is a party to the proceedings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.26</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The undertakings in Clause 12.25 shall not restrict the Seller&#146;s Group&#146;s ability to: (i)&nbsp;engage
any person who is no longer employed or engaged by the Group to assist with the conduct of the Seller&#146;s Group&#146;s affairs on a consultancy basis, provided that such person&#146;s employment or engagement with the Group was terminated by the
Group after Completion and, for the avoidance of doubt, no such person may be engaged in such capacity in order to compete with the Current Group Business in breach of Clause 12.27 or otherwise in a <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">day-to-day</FONT></FONT> operational role; or (ii)&nbsp;conduct generalised searches by: (a)&nbsp;the use of advertisements in periodicals of general circulation or online; or (b)&nbsp;the appointment of recruitment
agents, in each case, provided that such searches are not targeted at current or former directors or officers of any Group Company or Senior Group Employees. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Seller <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-compete</FONT></U> </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.27</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller undertakes to the Purchaser (for its benefit and the benefit of each other member of the
Purchaser&#146;s Group) that, during the Restricted Period, neither it nor any other member of the Seller&#146;s Group shall, directly or indirectly, carry on, or be engaged or interested in, in any capacity, any business in the Current Group
Territories that is the same as, and is likely to be in competition with, the Current Group Business. The Seller agrees that each such other member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group may enforce the benefit of the provisions of this Clause 12.27 in its
name whether or not the Purchaser is a party to the proceedings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.28</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">If a third party acquires direct or indirect Control of any member of the Seller&#146;s Group after Completion,
neither Clause 12.25 nor Clause 12.27 shall (subject to the following proviso) apply to such third party or any of its Related Persons, provided always that the Seller shall procure that such member of the Seller&#146;s Group and its subsidiary
undertakings (in each case, as of immediately prior to completion of such acquisition) shall be bound by and continue to observe the provisions of Clauses 12.25 and Clause 12.27, subject to Clauses 12.26 and 12.29. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.29</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The restrictions in Clause 12.27 shall not operate to prohibit any member of the Seller&#146;s Group from:
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.29.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">carrying on or being engaged or economically interested in any business in the Current Seller&#146;s Group
Territories (including any expansion into new territories (other than the Current Group Territories) or related products) which is the same as the Current Seller&#146;s Group Business; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.29.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">holding or being interested in by way of passive investment only up to five per cent. of the issued share
capital of a company listed on any recognised stock exchange; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">45 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.29.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">holding a direct or indirect interest of less than 10&nbsp;per cent. of the issued share capital of any
company, provided that no member of the Seller&#146;s Group exercises material influence over such company or has nominated an individual to a management function in, or the board of directors of, such company; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.29.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">fulfilling any obligation pursuant to the Transaction Documents or any agreement to be entered into pursuant to
the Transaction Documents; or </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.29.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">acquiring the whole or part of any business or shares in any company, provided that: (i)&nbsp;the principal
purpose of such acquisition is not to acquire a business or company which competes with any part of the Current Group Business in the Current Group Territories; and (ii)&nbsp;the revenue attributed to that part of the business or company which would
otherwise cause a breach of Clause 12.27 represents less than 10&nbsp;per cent. of the total revenue of such business or company for the last financial year. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.30</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller agrees that: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.30.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">each undertaking contained in Clauses 12.25 and 12.27 shall be construed as a separate undertaking;
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.30.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">the undertakings contained in Clauses 12.25 and 12.27 are no greater than is reasonable and necessary for the
protection of the interests of the Purchaser&#146;s Group; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.30.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">if any such undertaking is held to be void, against the public interest or unlawful or in any way an
unreasonable restraint of trade, but would be valid if deleted in part or reduced in application, such undertaking shall apply with such deletion or modification as may be necessary to make it valid and enforceable and the remaining undertakings
shall continue to bind the Seller; and </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.30.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">without prejudice to any other rights or remedies that the Purchaser may have, the Seller acknowledges and
agrees that damages alone may not be an adequate remedy for any breach of such undertakings by the Seller and, accordingly, the Purchaser shall be entitled to seek the remedies of injunction, specific performance or other equitable relief for any
threatened or actual breach of such undertakings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Purchaser
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-solicitation</FONT></U> </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.31</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser undertakes to the Seller (for its benefit and the benefit of each other member of the
Seller&#146;s Group) that, from the Completion Date until 18 months after the Completion Date, neither it nor any other member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group shall, directly or indirectly, solicit for employment, hire or employ: (i)&nbsp;any Senior
Seller&#146;s Group Employee; (ii)&nbsp;any then current director or officer of any member of the Seller&#146;s Group; or (iii)&nbsp;any former director or officer of any member of the Seller&#146;s Group (to the extent that such persons have been
employed or engaged by the Seller&#146;s Group in the 12 months prior to the Completion Date), in each case, whether or not such person would commit a breach of any employment or service contract with the Seller&#146;s Group in leaving such
employment or service or otherwise doing so. The Purchaser agrees that each such other member of the Seller&#146;s Group may enforce the benefit of the provisions of this Clause 12.31 in its name whether or not the Seller is a party to the
proceedings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.32</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The undertakings in Clause 12.31 shall not restrict the Purchaser Group&#146;s ability to: (i)&nbsp;engage any
person who is no longer employed or engaged by the Seller&#146;s Group to assist with the conduct of the Group&#146;s affairs on a consultancy basis, provided that such person&#146;s employment or engagement with the Seller&#146;s Group was
terminated by the Seller&#146;s Group and, for the avoidance of doubt, no such person may be engaged in such capacity in order to compete with the Current Seller&#146;s Group Business in breach of Clause 12.33 or otherwise in a <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap"><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">day-to-day</FONT></FONT> </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">46 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">
operational role; or (ii)&nbsp;conduct generalised searches by: (a)&nbsp;the use of advertisements in periodicals of general circulation or online; or (b)&nbsp;the appointment of recruitment
agents, in each case, provided that such searches are not targeted at current or former directors or officers of any member of the Seller&#146;s Group or Senior Seller&#146;s Group Employees. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Purchaser <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-compete</FONT></U><U> (Spain)</U> </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.33</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser undertakes to the Seller (for its benefit and the benefit of each other member of the
Seller&#146;s Group and any third party acquiror of Clear Channel Espa&ntilde;a S.L.U.) that, during the Restricted Period, neither it nor any other member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group (including the Group) shall, directly or indirectly, carry on,
or be engaged or economically interested in, any business in Spain that is the same as, and is likely to be in competition with, the Current Seller&#146;s Group Business in Spain. The Purchaser agrees that each such other member of the Seller&#146;s
Group and any third party acquiror of Clear Channel Espa&ntilde;a S.L.U. may enforce the benefit of the provisions of this Clause 12.33 in its name whether or not the Seller is a party to the proceedings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.34</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">If a third party acquires direct or indirect Control of any member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group after
Completion, neither Clause 12.31 nor Clause 12.33 shall (subject to the following proviso) apply to such third party or any of its Related Persons, provided always that the Purchaser shall procure that such member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group and
its subsidiary undertakings (in each case, as of immediately prior to completion of such acquisition) shall be bound by and continue to observe the provisions of Clauses 12.31 and 12.33, subject to Clauses 12.32 and 12.35. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.35</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The restrictions in Clause 12.33 shall not operate to prohibit any member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group from:
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.35.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">carrying on or being engaged or economically interested in, any business in the Current Group Territories
(including any expansion into new territories (other than Spain) or related products) which is the same as the Current Group Business; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.35.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">holding or being interested in by way of passive investment only up to five per cent. of the issued share
capital of a company listed on any recognised stock exchange; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.35.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">holding a direct or indirect interest of less than 10&nbsp;per cent. of the issued share capital of any
company, provided that no member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group exercises material influence over such company or has nominated an individual to a management function in, or the board of directors of, such company; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.35.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">fulfilling any obligation pursuant to the Transaction Documents or any agreement to be entered into pursuant to
the Transaction Documents; or </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.35.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">acquiring the whole or part of any business or shares in any company, provided that: (i)&nbsp;the principal
purpose of such acquisition is not to acquire a business or company which competes with any part of the Current Seller&#146;s Group Business in Spain; and (ii)&nbsp;the revenue attributed to that part of the business or company which would otherwise
cause a breach of Clause 12.33 represents less than 10&nbsp;per cent. of the total revenue of such business or company for the last financial year. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.36</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser agrees that: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.36.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">each undertaking contained in Clauses 12.31 and 12.33 shall be construed as a separate undertaking;
</P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">47 </P>

protection of the interests of the Seller&#146;s Group; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.36.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">if any such undertaking is held to be void, against the public interest or unlawful or in any way an
unreasonable restraint of trade, but would be valid if deleted in part or reduced in application, such undertaking shall apply with such deletion or modification as may be necessary to make it valid and enforceable and the remaining undertakings
shall continue to bind the Purchaser; and </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.36.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">without prejudice to any other rights or remedies that the Seller may have, the Purchaser acknowledges and
agrees that damages alone may not be an adequate remedy for any breach of such undertakings by the Purchaser and, accordingly, the Seller shall be entitled to seek the remedies of injunction, specific performance or other equitable relief for any
threatened or actual breach of such undertakings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Purchaser <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-compete</FONT>
(U.S.)</U> </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.37</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser undertakes to the Seller (for its benefit and the benefit of each other member of the
Seller&#146;s Group) that, during the Restricted Period, neither it nor any other member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group (including the Group) shall, directly or indirectly, carry on, or be engaged or economically interested in, any business in the
U.S. that is the same as, and is likely to be in competition with, the Current Seller&#146;s Group Business in the U.S.. The Purchaser agrees that each such other member of the Seller&#146;s Group may enforce the benefit of the provisions of this
Clause 12.37 in its name whether or not the Seller is a party to the proceedings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">If a third party acquires direct or indirect Control of any member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group after
Completion, neither Clause 12.31 nor Clause 12.37 shall (subject to the following proviso) apply to such third party or any of its Related Persons, provided always that the Purchaser shall procure that such member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group and
its subsidiary undertakings (in each case, as of immediately prior to completion of such acquisition) shall be bound by and continue to observe the provisions of Clauses 12.31 and 12.37, subject to Clauses 12.32 and 12.39. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.39.1</TD>

(including any expansion into new territories (other than the U.S.) or related products) which is the same as the Current Group Business; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.39.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">holding or being interested in by way of passive investment only up to five per cent. of the issued share
capital of a company listed on any recognised stock exchange; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.39.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">holding a direct or indirect interest of less than 10&nbsp;per cent. of the issued share capital of any
company, provided that no member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group exercises material influence over such company or has nominated an individual to a management function in, or the board of directors of, such company; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.39.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">fulfilling any obligation pursuant to the Transaction Documents or any agreement to be entered into pursuant to
the Transaction Documents; or </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.39.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">acquiring the whole or part of any business or shares in any company, provided that: (i)&nbsp;the principal
purpose of such acquisition is not to acquire a business or company which competes with any part of the Current Seller&#146;s Group Business in the U.S.; and (ii)&nbsp;the revenue attributed to that part of the business or company which would
otherwise cause a breach of Clause 12.37 represents less than 10&nbsp;per cent. of the total revenue of such business or company for the last financial year. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">48 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.40</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser agrees that: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.40.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">each undertaking contained in Clauses 12.31 and 12.37 shall be construed as a separate undertaking;
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.40.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">the undertakings contained in Clauses 12.31 and 12.37 are no greater than is reasonable and necessary for the
protection of the interests of the Seller&#146;s Group; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.40.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">if any such undertaking is held to be void, against the public interest or unlawful or in any way an
unreasonable restraint of trade, but would be valid if deleted in part or reduced in application, such undertaking shall apply with such deletion or modification as may be necessary to make it valid and enforceable and the remaining undertakings
shall continue to bind the Purchaser; and </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.40.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">without prejudice to any other rights or remedies that the Seller may have, the Purchaser acknowledges and
agrees that damages alone may not be an adequate remedy for any breach of such undertakings by the Purchaser and, accordingly, the Seller shall be entitled to seek the remedies of injunction, specific performance or other equitable relief for any
threatened or actual breach of such undertakings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Purchaser <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-compete</FONT>
(</U><U>Brazil, Chile, Mexico, Peru, Singapore, the Caribbean and China</U><U>)</U> </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.41</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser undertakes to the Seller (for its benefit and the benefit of each other member of the
Seller&#146;s Group) that, during the Restricted Period, neither it nor any other member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group (including the Group) shall, directly or indirectly, carry on, or be engaged or economically interested in, any business in
Brazil, Chile, Mexico, Peru, Singapore, the Caribbean or China that is the same as, and is likely to be in competition with, the Current Seller&#146;s Group Business in Brazil, Chile, Mexico, Peru, Singapore, the Caribbean or China. The Purchaser
agrees that each such other member of the Seller&#146;s Group may enforce the benefit of the provisions of this Clause 12.41 in its name whether or not the Seller is a party to the proceedings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.42</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">If a third party acquires direct or indirect Control of any member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group after
Completion, neither Clause 12.31 nor Clause 12.41 shall (subject to the following proviso) apply to such third party or any of its Related Persons, provided always that the Purchaser shall procure that such member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group and
its subsidiary undertakings (in each case, as of immediately prior to completion of such acquisition) shall be bound by and continue to observe the provisions of Clauses 12.31 and 12.41, subject to Clauses 12.32 and 12.43. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.43</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The restrictions in Clause 12.41 shall not operate to prohibit any member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group from:
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.43.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">carrying on or being engaged or economically interested in, any business in the Current Group Territories
(including any expansion into new territories (other than Brazil, Chile, Mexico, Peru, Singapore, the Caribbean or China) or related products) which is the same as the Current Group Business; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.43.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">holding or being interested in by way of passive investment only up to five per cent. of the issued share
capital of a company listed on any recognised stock exchange; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.43.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">holding a direct or indirect interest of less than 10&nbsp;per cent. of the issued share capital of any
company, provided that no member of the Purchaser&#146;s Group exercises material influence over such company or has nominated an individual to a management function in, or the board of directors of, such company; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">49 </P>

agrees that damages alone may not be an adequate remedy for any breach of such undertakings by the Purchaser and, accordingly, the Seller shall be entitled to seek the remedies of injunction, specific performance or other equitable relief for any
threatened or actual breach of such undertakings. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Existing IP Agreements</U> </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

Existing IP Agreement expires in accordance with its terms and conditions. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Specific Indemnities</U> </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.46</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Subject to Clause 13, the Seller undertakes to pay to the Purchaser on demand (on a dollar for dollar basis) an
amount equal to any and all Indemnifiable Losses suffered or incurred by the Purchaser or any of its Related Persons (including the Group Companies) as a result of or in connection with: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.46.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">any increase in the premium payable under the Aviva Insurance Policy, each a &#147;<U>Specific
Indemnity</U>&#148;. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">50 </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.47</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Subject to Clause 13, the Purchaser undertakes to pay to the Seller on demand (on a dollar for dollar basis) an
amount equal to any decrease in the premium payable under the Aviva Insurance Policy. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>13</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B>LIMITATION OF LIABILITY </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Monetary limits</U> </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">13.1</TD>
